metadata.description: The id of IoT Hub instance to which the workbook will be associated
The id of Application Insights instance to which the workbook will be associated for fetching telemetry entries
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The unique guid for this workbook instance

parameters.name: InsightsMetricsExists

content.query:
let connectivityLost = customMetrics
| where name == "StationConnectivityLost"
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "StationConnectivityLost"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (connectivityLost) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let receiveWindowMisses = customMetrics
| where name == "ReceiveWindowMisses"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Sum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "ReceiveWindowMisses"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (receiveWindowMisses) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let unhandledExceptions = customMetrics
| where name == "UnhandledExceptions"
| project name, valueSum, exceptionKeyword = "Exception"
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name, exceptionKeyword
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "UnhandledExceptions"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (unhandledExceptions) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let c2dmessagesTooLong = customMetrics
| where name == "C2DMessageTooLong"
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Count = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "C2DMessageTooLong"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (c2dmessagesTooLong) on name
| project-away name, timestamp
content.noDataMessage: No C2D messages that were too long detected

content.query:
let activeConnections = customMetrics
| where name == "ActiveStationConnections"
| order by timestamp desc
| project value, name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "ActiveStationConnections"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (activeConnections) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let deliveryLatency = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageDeliveryLatency"
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageDeliveryLatency"
| make-series Trend = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (deliveryLatency) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let joinRequests = customMetrics
| where name == "JoinRequests"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize JoinRequestSum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "JoinRequests"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (joinRequests) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let messageSizes = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageSize"
| order by timestamp desc
| summarize D2CMessageSize = avg(value) by name;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessageSize"
| make-series Hist = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on value from 5.0 to 250.0 step 5.0 by name
| join (messageSizes) on name

let sum = customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessagesReceived"
| order by timestamp desc
| project name, valueSum
| summarize Sum = sum(valueSum) by name
| take 1;
customMetrics
| where name == "D2CMessagesReceived"
| make-series Trend = sum(valueSum) default = 0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by name
| join (sum) on name
| project-away name, timestamp

let rawData = dependencies
| project duration, name, type, timestamp, EndpointWithoutDeviceId = extract("(.*)/[0-9a-zA-Z]{16}$", 1, name)
| project duration, type, timestamp, Endpoint = iff(isempty(EndpointWithoutDeviceId), name, EndpointWithoutDeviceId);
let history = rawData
| make-series avg(duration) default=0 on timestamp from {timeRange:start} to {timeRange:end} step {timeRange:grain} by Endpoint
| project-away timestamp;
rawData
| summarize Mean = avg(duration), (p95) = percentiles(duration, 95), Requests = count() by type, Endpoint
| join (history) on Endpoint
| order by Requests desc

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}
| where "*" in ({alertResources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({alertResources})
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| summarize Count=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed") 
by Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| order by Severity asc

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}  
| extend Severity=tostring(properties.essentials.severity)
| where Severity in ({Severity})
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| project AlertId=id, StartTime=todatetime(tostring(properties.essentials.startDateTime)), Severity, State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState), Name=name, TargetResource = tostring(properties.essentials.targetResource), MonitorService = tostring(properties.essentials.monitorService), SignalType=tostring(properties.essentials.signalType), Description=tostring(properties.essentials.description)

AlertsManagementResources | where type =~ 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| where todatetime(properties.essentials.startDateTime) {timeRange}  
| extend State=tostring(properties.essentials.alertState)
| where "*" in ({State}) or State in ({State})
| where "*" in ({alertResources}) or properties.essentials.targetResource in~ ({alertResources})
| summarize Alerts=count(), New=countif(State=="New"), 
Acknowledged=countif(State=="Acknowledged"), 
Closed=countif(State=="Closed")
by Resource=tostring(properties.essentials.targetResource )
| order by Alerts desc
content.title: Alerts by Region
